name: Incident Response Playbook - Example
description: Playbook for handling multiple attack vectors.

steps.name: Triage (Initial - Affectation Automatique/Manuelle)
steps.description: Identify the initial type of attack.

steps.name: Informer l'utilisateur/Rassembler des informations et des preuves
steps.description: Inform the user and gather information for evidence.

steps.name: Réparer/Mettre à jour le système
steps.description: Repair or update the system, or re-image and update.

steps.name: Surveiller les utilisateurs/systèmes cibles
steps.description: Monitor the affected users and systems.
